snippet: Though the squatters had agreed to leave, when police officers in riot gear charged in, pandemonium erupted and squatters set two fires.
abstract: Brazilian police action to remove squatters from Rio de Janeiro building once planned as hotel for 2016 Olympic Games results in chaos, with squatters setting fires.
lead_paragraph: Though the squatters had agreed to leave, when police officers in riot gear charged in, pandemonium erupted and squatters set two fires.

headline.main: Brazil: Eviction of Squatters Turns Chaotic Amid Olympic Tensions
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Brazil: Eviction of Squatters Turns Chaotic Amid Olympic Tensions
